p: Human cancer cell lines MCF-7 (breast adenocarcinoma), HCT116 (colon carcinoma), HepG2 (hepatocellular carcinoma), HL-60 (promyelocytic leukemia), and human non-cancer cell line MRC-5 (lung fibroblast) were obtained from the American Type Culture Collection (ATCC, Manassas, VA, USA). The cells were cultured as recommended by the ATCC. Cell viability was examined via trypan blue exclusion method for all experiments.
